This document describes what happens on login.

Based on PouchDB's plugin.

  1. read local doc with username and password
  2. pouchdb.logIn
  3. create userDoc collection
  4. sync userDoc collection
  5. extract project list from userDoc
  6. loop projects
  7. create projectDef collections
  8. sync projectDef collections
  9. extract table lists from projectDefs
  10. loop tables
  11. create table collections
  12. sync table collections
